title: Music Player App
description: A fully functional offline music player built using Kotlin and XML with media controls and playlist support.

title: Chatbot with Keras
description: A simple chatbot built using deep learning (Keras and TensorFlow) that handles basic queries.

title: Code Tracker Hub
description: A centralized dashboard that integrates coding platform progress like LeetCode, GeeksForGeeks, and more, giving users an overview of their coding journey.

title: CarPoolingSystem
description: A backend service for organizing carpool rides, enabling users to register, manage vehicles, and coordinate ride-sharing efficiently and securely.

title: Chess-AI
description: A graphical chess game implemented using Pygame, featuring an AI opponent that utilizes alpha-beta pruning to evaluate possible moves and select the best one, providing interactive play against the computer with move validation and game logic.

title: Tetris-Java
description: A classic Tetris game implemented in Java, providing smooth gameplay, intuitive controls, and traditional Tetris mechanics. The project features a graphical interface for interactive play, score tracking, and increasing difficulty levels as the game progresses.

title: TODO-Web-App
description: A web-based task management application that allows users to create, edit, and organize their to-do lists. The app provides functionalities such as adding new tasks, marking tasks as completed, editing existing items, and deleting tasks, offering a simple and interactive interface for personal productivity.

title: AI Coding Platform
description: Built AI-Coding-Platform, an interactive web app for AI-enhanced coding challenges with real-time feedback and progress tracking

title: Leetcode Helper Extension
description: Developed a Chrome extension that provides hints and solutions for Leetcode problems, enhancing user experience and learning efficiency.
